comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Flickr Commons, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 50600163@N07
comment._content: I was at LSE then, and I think I remember this young woman!  I had a similar hairstyle but it was dark, and I was the year above her.  Don't think I took part in this documentary though.  I was in the Sociology and Anthropology departments.  Good picture!
